\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* art thou drawn \w together|strong="H2388"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* grief? Hast thou \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* thy counsellor \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* sorrow hath \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* thee \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* woman \w in|strong="H4428"\w* labour?

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* pain \w and|strong="H0935"\w* labour, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sion, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* shalt thou \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.
